biography:
Meghann Artes holds an MFA from the Animation Workshop at UCLA. In addition to her academic work, she has over fifteen years of entertainment industry experience working for companies like Dreamworks, Nickelodeon, Bix Pix, Noggin, NBC, ABC and Sesame Street. She has won both an Emmy and a Peabody and her short films have enjoyed success in film festivals both across the country and internationally. Her last short film Speed Dating (2014) was nominated for Best Animated Short at Raindance Film Festival in London. Meghann is currently in post-production on her latest film, Sleepy Steve (2015), a comically absurd short film that combines live action, animation and visual effects. She plans to have the film finished and ready for festivals in the spring.
